short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Combine your online and in-store shopping.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Browzzer extension is part of the free platform (app, web, and extension) that helps you organize, share, and compare your online and in-store options and share it with others to get their opinion. Watch the tutorial on how to use the extension. 

Extension is an easy way to add new pages and new houses to your albums with a push of a button. Once installed, you can go to your favorite website and as you get to a product page or a new real-estate listing, you can see the add to browzzer button and you can add the item to your existing album (pause) or create a new one.
